name: AIE AllStars!
description:
Congratulations to the 2021 graduates for AIE!

To celebrate this festive occasion, we have created a fighting game starring the characters from all 6 major production games on the Adelaide Campus!

Play on 7 maps against your friends or AI!

Controls:

exit - esc

mash attack to unleash a 3-hit combo

Player 1:

move - AD

jump - W

dash - J

attack - K

ability - L

Player 2 (Requires Numlock):

move - left and right Arrow

jump - up arrow

dash - 4

attack - 5

ability - 6

Characters:

Haem:

A scavenger from the mountain of Haem searching for the power to become a demi-god.

passive - Every third attack heals you if it hits

ability - Sacrifice a bit of your health to summon a shockwave which knocks enemies away

The Pound:

In a world where a virus turns people into savage ravagers, Casey survives in the Australian outback.

passive - At lower health, gain movement speed

ability - Pull out your crossbow and shoot a bolt forward

Vibe City:

A girl with a grappling hook and a goal to tag the city with spray cans.

passive - increased base movement speed

ability - shoot your grappling hook and pull yourself towards whatever it hits

ShadowStep:

A lone Samurai strives to purge the blight plaguing his homeland.

passive - Triple jump

ability - Ready your blade and counter anyone who attacks you

Golden Phoenix:

A seafolk creature fighting over an island.

passive - Triple jump, first and third attack shoots a fast bullet

ability - Jump backwards into the air and shoot an exploding egg covering your exit

Wizards of Nor:

A wizard apprentice travelling to save his master from peril.

passive - Jumping does a small amount of damage to anyone nearby, third attack summons a fireball

ability - summon a firepillar from the ground
